roles.title: stepmother
quotes: She also became a willing stepmother to her husband's five children
Born: 17-October-1945 in Gaza Province, Mozambique
Graça Simbine Machel was born on 17 October 1945, in Gaza, Mozambique
a church-based scholarship made it possible for her to attend Lisbon University (Portugal) in 1968
she was forced to abandon her education and flee to Switzerland
When Machel arrived in Tanzania from Europe, she found an efficiently run FRELIMO headquarters operation
Subsequently, she spent a short period in Mozambique's Cabo Delgado Province
she was appointed Deputy Director of the Frelimo Secondary School at Bagamoyo, Tanzania, in 1974
